data.title: Sing It Loud
data.meta_description: Sing It Loud is the 14th Hi-5 album, released in 2011 by Sony Music. This is the final album to feature Fely Irvine, Tim Maddren and Casey Burgess. data.text:
Released

November 11, 2011

Recorded

2011

Label

Sony Music

Previous Album

Turn The Music Up!

Next Album

Santa Claus Is Coming!

Sing It Loud is the 14th Hi-5 album, released in 2011 by Sony Music. This is the final album to feature Fely Irvine, Tim Maddren and Casey Burgess. It is the first album to feature remake songs from the first generation cast. No remake songlets from Series 13 were added to this album. In 2012, it was nominated for an ARIA Music Award for Best Children's Album but lost to The Wiggles Surfer Jeff.

Track Listing[]

L.O.V.E. - Hi-5

Ready Or Not - Hi-5

Wonderful - Hi-5

Five Senses - Hi-5

Making Music - Hi-5

Amazing - Hi-5

Underwater Discovery - Hi-5

Robot No. 1 - Hi-5

Wish Upon A Star - Hi-5
